t: Lady Gaga’s Beauty Brand Gives Up on Amazon - Marketplace Pulse
s: May 17, 2022 - Three years ago, Lady Gaga launched a cosmetics brand Haus Laboratories to be sold exclusively through Amazon. However, the brand flopped and is set to relaunch at Sephora. The relaunched brand will no longer be available on Amazon.

t: Amazon Launched a Brand With Lady Gaga to Show Off - Marketplace Pulse
s: September 18, 2019 - Amazon, together with singer Lady Gaga, launched a beauty line Haus Laboratories. The first major beauty brand sold exclusively on Amazon. Pushed by the Amazon marketing efforts on Prime Day, the brand became the number one best-seller in the Makeup category by the end of the event.

t: Lady Gaga to launch beauty line on Amazon as retailer targets cosmetics business | Reuters
s: July 9, 2019 - (Reuters) - Pop star Lady Gaga on Tuesday announced a line of beauty products exclusively for sale on Amazon · in a boost to the online retailer's cosmetics business. The brand, Haus Laboratories, will launch in September for shoppers in nearly a dozen countries, including the United States, ...

t: Lady Gaga reveals Amazon-exclusive beauty brand | Fox News
s: Move over, Rihanna: Lady Gaga is launching her own beauty brand. The “A Star Is Born” actress spoke to Business of Fashion about the new line — Haus Laboratories — which will exclusively launch on Amazon starting in September.

t: Haus Labs - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - The first products included lip liner, lip gloss, and liquid-to-powder shimmer. In 2022, Haus Laboratories renamed itself Haus Labs by Lady Gaga as part of its rebranding campaign, which also consisted of a relaunch of the brand on June 9 for which it partnered with Sephora as its retail outlet.

t: Amazon.com : HAUS LABORATORIES By Lady Gaga: GLAM ROOM PALETTE NO. 1: FAME | 10-Shade Eyeshadow Palette, Blendable & Buildable Eye Makeup with Pigmented Matte, Metallic, Shimmer, and Sparkle Finishes : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I did my makeup at 7 am and still had this on at 8 after a day of work and a trip to the gym. Cannot beat the price for such a great product. I am a huge Lady Gaga fan as well and love how the Haus Lab products work for ultra glam as well as everyday looks. ... This palette is so pretty.
